name: mobx.dart
description: This file is purely to leverage NPM for running the scripts. This is NOT to track any dependencies.

scripts.pub:get:mobx: cd mobx; flutter packages pub get;
scripts.pub:upgrade:mobx: cd mobx; flutter packages pub upgrade;
scripts.pub:get:mobx_codegen: cd mobx_codegen; flutter packages pub get;
scripts.pub:upgrade:mobx_codegen: cd mobx_codegen; flutter packages pub upgrade;
scripts.gen:mobx:example: cd mobx/example; flutter packages pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs;
scripts.gen:mobx_examples: cd mobx_examples; flutter packages pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs;
scripts.gen:mobx_codegen: cd mobx_codegen; flutter packages pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs;
scripts.gen:mobx_examples:watch: cd mobx_examples; flutter packages pub run build_runner watch --delete-conflicting-outputs;
